title: Connecting Towns: A South Gippsland Cluster
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Gippsland (Vic.) - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Rural conditions
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Victoria - Rural conditions
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Country life - Australia
abstract: A tour through four small towns and how they are working together to create opportunities. Filmed as part of 'ACMI in the Regions: Stories from South Gippsland'.
description: Take a tour through four small picturesque towns in South Gippsland that are combining their resources to create opportunities for growth. Here we meet some locals from Bena, Loch, Poowong and Nyora, in their places of significance as they reflect on personal memories and describe the uniqueness of where they live.
